message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing [product description] that I think you'd really enjoy. I'm asking for $200 for it, but I'm open to negotiation.
Hi Alice, I really appreciate you offering this [product description] to me.  $200 is a bit more than I'm able to spend right now. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While $100 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $175.  Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  $175 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about $150?  This is my final offer, and I'm ready to buy if you're willing to accept.
